dcterms:creator: A. Shahroudy
J. Liu
T.-T. Ng
G. Wang
dcterms:description: A large scale dataset for 3D human activity analysis, providing skeleton sequences that can be used for action recognition.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D Action Recognition Dataset

dcterms:creator: R. Vemulapalli
F. Arrate
R. Chellappa
dcterms:description: A method of acquiring skeleton sequences using RGB+D cameras, specifically Microsoft's Kinect, which provides a natural 3D kinematic description of human motions.
dcterms:title: Microsoft Kinect

dcterms:creator: B. Fornberg
dcterms:description: A dataset used for numerical differentiation, providing finite difference formulas on arbitrarily spaced grids.
dcterms:title: NTU Action Recognition dataset

dcterms:creator: B. Fornberg
dcterms:description: A dataset referenced for calculating weights in finite difference formulas, relevant for numerical differentiation tasks.
dcterms:title: NTU Action Recognition dataset
